subject: Bullfighting and Bull Runs
lead_paragraph: José Tomás has been considered a kind of savior amid the dwindling spectacle that is bullfighting, but on Sunday, in front of more than 45,000 fans in Mexico City, he brought the bull in too close.
snippet: José Tomás has been considered a kind of savior amid the dwindling spectacle that is bullfighting, but on Sunday, in front of more than 45,000 fans in Mexico City, he brought the bull in too close.
